objectives: Fix validator NameError and emit both canonical/full digest telemetry.
Add /profile command gate wiring into command bar documentation and runtime.
patch_outline: Modify tools/validate_kernel.py to include identity loader helper and CLI exit codes.
Extend command dispatcher to register /profile with quality gate scanning routine.
Add regression tests covering validator success/failure scenarios and /profile happy/sad paths.

rollout_notes.mitigation: Feature flag /profile to informational mode until SEP ratified.
